title: Android QR Reader - Syncs Data To Google Sheets
desc: I am mainly interested in the coding/backend. I can perfect the design myself once you send me the Android Studio File.Here is idea of the app - it's designed to track how long people are spending in a row.1. Login Screen (who you are) - Scan QR Code2. Job Screen (what you are doing) - Scan QR Code3. Row Number Screen (where are you) - Scan QR Code and Timestamp4. End Row Button - Timestamp5. Goes back to Row Number Screen, unless you push a "Logout" or "Change Job" button.I want that information to sync to a Google Sheet, and you would have 5 columns:Employee Number - Job Number - Row Number - Start Time - Finish TimeThe data is sent each time the person hits the "End Row Button".Important info:Must be in android studioEverything must be locked to portraitMust work if device is offline, and sync when it gets a connection.This can give you an idea of the Google Sheet sync - [url removed, login to view]

title: Electronic Hardware Design for remote controller for IOS & Android -- 2
desc: We are developing a remote controller that will connect to IOS & Android mobile devices through Bluetooth(or BLE) and allow for control of audio (play/pause, volume up, volume down, next tract, previous track) and communication controls (start call, end call, push to talk). The Device will have 4 buttons (see [url removed, login to view]).Deliverables:1.	Technology (BLE vs Bluetooth classic) selection2.	Chipset selection3.	PCBA layout files (all types of files including gerber)4.	Working physical prototype for PCBA with example IOS application (to test 4th button).5.	Source code for chipset6.     Product is ready for mass production and Production Files are delivered.Design Requirements:•	Media Controls work with all platforms without app (IOS & Android)•	Push to talk button works with Remote.•	Bluetooth module with antenna and certifications (FCC, IC, CE)•	Chip costs less than $12 in quantities of more than 1000•	2 PCBs (design with breakout, see example design below for details)•	Accord to our dimensions (we might change dimensions later)Available Resources in attached to this document:1.	Exploded View of Device ([url removed, login to view])2.	Button Function Diagram ([url removed, login to view])3.	Dimensions for PCBA design ([url removed, login to view])Developer needs to be an Expert with Embedded Hardware design with good understanding of IOS development. If you are a team with those capabilities we will prefer that.

title: Sistema Online e Aplicativo Android
desc: I've done a more detailed outline of how it should work. For those who are interested I will send.System to manage gym of bodybuilding and other sports.Consist of access by the system's general administrator, the academy manager, and a front-end for interaction with the students.No system or general administrator can create payment plans for academy owners, and the owner of the academy creates projects for his students.I will send models for color inspiration.App:The application is for students 'and teachers' use.In the app people can search for gyms by city or on the map by geolocation, to the nearest ones, also by modality of sport. By locating on the gym the student clicks on thethey will be able to see the available modalities in this gym, the schedules and availability of plans and schedules and the evaluation of the users (the star rating). They can register and go to the gym. And if you are already registered in the system, log in and follow the classes, schedules, change of schedules and cancellation of your classes and performance and also follow your training plans. They can turn notifications on and off. You can also login with facebook or google and stay logged in so you do not need to log in every time you open the app.For teachers: they can follow new students enrolled in their classes, modify schedules or cancel classes and notify students. Also create training plans.
